Package group10.client.entity

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
group10.client.entity.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Class that is used to transfer Game State between players
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay
See Also:
Serializable, Serialized Form

      public GameState​(GameLogic gameLogicVariables, boolean bluffed, Card cardThrown, boolean isGameOver)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      gameLogicVariables - game logic variables
      bluffed - flag of if the user has bluffed or not
      cardThrown - thrown card by player
      isGameOver - denotes if game is ended or not.
